desc: "A Surf Shop Like No Other", the closest shop to Florida's best known wave: Sebastian Inlet. We feature local surfboard shapers, brands, artists, designers & entrepreneurs

layout.text: The closest shop to Florida's best known wave. We're your adventure center on Florida's Surf Coast. From Surf & SUP to unique events and great surf camps, we're serious about having fun.
Paddling our SUP rentals on North America's most biodiverse lagoon ecosystem is a head-clearing experience. Try it. You'll like it.
